title: Show up to Resist Trump, Resist Corporate Greed, and Support Workers!
body:
[{"type": "banner_image", "value": {"photo": 16, "internal_link": null, "external_link": "https://www.facebook.com/events/1909626335977173/permalink/1914913078781832/", "alt_text": ""}, "id": "c3519e5a-7b06-48dc-ad17-755330e38a2e"}, {"type": "paragraph", "value": "
SEIU 32BJ Philadelphia Airport workers need your support on July 13. PHL Airport workers-who are mostly low-wage immigrants and people of color –have been fighting for four years to win fair treatment, a living wage and a union. The City of Philadelphia voted to raise the wage for airport workers by a huge majority. And during this time the airport workers have protested, gone on strike and voted overwhelmingly to join their union.

Now American Airlines’ largest contractors—PrimeFlight and Prospect—are refusing to bargain with their workers’ recently elected union. Instead of supporting the workers who help make them billions in profits, American Airlines is looking the other way as their contractors trample their workers’ rights. American’s two largest contractors at PHL are betting that the Trump administration will side with corporations against working people and soon get rid of airport workers’ union organizing rights altogether.

Philadelphia Airport Action

July 13: 12-2PM

Philadelphia Airport B/C Terminal

", "id": "0a6c192a-a07f-47ee-9e46-eaf52650783f"}, {"type": "call_to_action", "value": {"title": "Spread the word and come down in support!", "cta_copy": "Don’t let this corporate gamble against Philadelphia airport workers pay off. Show up to resist Trump and the corporations who hide behind him.", "button_title": "RSVP on Facebook!", "button_link": null, "button_external_link": "https://www.facebook.com/events/1909626335977173/permalink/1914913078781832/"}, "id": "6757acfd-4824-4e31-8997-2cea25e6bea1"}]
